headline.print_headline: Obama Signs Relief From Flood Insurance Hike
headline.main: Obama Signs Relief From Flood Insurance Hike

docs.snippet: Homeowners living in flood-prone areas are getting relief from big spikes in insurance costs under legislation President Barack Obama signed into law Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Homeowners living in flood-prone areas are getting relief from big spikes in insurance costs under legislation President Barack Obama signed into law Friday.

headline.print_headline: Death Row Kidney? Desperate Oregon Man Says No
headline.main: Death Row Kidney? Desperate Oregon Man Says No

docs.snippet: A man who's been standing along the state highway through his town with a sign pleading for a kidney donor says he's not so desperate he'd accept an organ from a man on Oregon's death row for killing his wife and three children....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who's been standing along the state highway through his town with a sign pleading for a kidney donor says he's not so desperate he'd accept an organ from a man on Oregon's death row for killing his wife and three children.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Consumer Agency to Focus on Workplace Diversity, Fairness
headline.main: U.S. Consumer Agency to Focus on Workplace Diversity, Fairness

docs.snippet: The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said on Friday it is increasing efforts within the agency to create a more diverse and fair work environment following concerns about discrimination....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said on Friday it is increasing efforts within the agency to create a more diverse and fair work environment following concerns about discrimination.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Mulling Undersea Surveillance Gear for Malaysia Plane Hunt
headline.main: U.S. Mulling Undersea Surveillance Gear for Malaysia Plane Hunt

docs.snippet: The Pentagon said on Friday it was considering a request from Malaysian Defense Minister Hishammuddin Hussein to provide undersea surveillance equipment to help in the search for the missing Malaysia Air Flight 370....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pentagon said on Friday it was considering a request from Malaysian Defense Minister Hishammuddin Hussein to provide undersea surveillance equipment to help in the search for the missing Malaysia Air Flight 370.

headline.main: Reader Questions, Answered: Returning to Work After a Career Break

docs.snippet: Times readers ask career development experts for guidance on returning to the workforce after a break to care for children or aging parents....

headline.print_headline: Killing of 7 Marks Rise of Mexico Drug Corridor
headline.main: Killing of 7 Marks Rise of Mexico Drug Corridor

docs.snippet: The massacre of seven men near the Mexico-Arizona border came in a previously quiet area increasingly used as a drug-trafficking corridor, and a U.S. expert said Friday the attack in the newly valuable territory could be the work of rivals of the ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The massacre of seven men near the Mexico-Arizona border came in a previously quiet area increasingly used as a drug-trafficking corridor, and a U.S. expert said Friday the attack in the newly valuable territory could be the work of rivals of the once-dominant Sinaloa cartel trying to exploit the arrest of the gang's leader.

headline.print_headline: California Student Files Claim Over Racial Abuse
headline.main: California Student Files Claim Over Racial Abuse

docs.snippet: A black student who says his suite mates at a California university put a bike lock around his neck and racially harassed him has filed a $5 million claim against the school....
docs.lead_paragraph: A black student who says his suite mates at a California university put a bike lock around his neck and racially harassed him has filed a $5 million claim against the school.

headline.print_headline: Bomb Explodes on Runway of Libya's Main Airport in Tripoli
headline.main: Bomb Explodes on Runway of Libya's Main Airport in Tripoli

docs.snippet: A bomb exploded on the runway of Libya's main airport on Friday, the transport minister said, highlighting the deteriorating security situation in the north African country almost three years after Muammar Gaddafi was ousted....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bomb exploded on the runway of Libya's main airport on Friday, the transport minister said, highlighting the deteriorating security situation in the north African country almost three years after Muammar Gaddafi was ousted.

headline.main: Another Price Cut for the Xbox One

docs.snippet: On Friday, Walmart and Best Buy began offering a bundle of Microsoft’s Xbox One and Titanfall, a high-profile science fiction shooter game, for $450, a $50 price cut on the bundle....
docs.abstract: On Friday, Walmart and Best Buy began offering a bundle of Microsoft’s Xbox One and Titanfall, a high-profile science fiction shooter game, for $450, a $50 price cut on the bundle.
